body_html:
Me too...

Ubuntu: 16.04
Cuda: 8.0.27 RC
cudnn: 5.0.5 (thrust issue?)
tensorflow: 0.9.0 (my tensorflow is certainly built from source)

the error message is like:

tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:422] could not set cudnn tensor descriptor: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM

Any solutions ?

Thank you very much....
Pei
